channel.description: Recent content in health data on jamesm.blog

item.title: Tracking Health Data
item.description: Apps (iOS) Apple Health Megafit-Health Fitness Tool Measures & tracks the following weight, Body Mass Index (BMI), body fat %, body fat weight, body water, bone mass, rate of subcutaneous fat, visceral fat levels, basal metabolism body age, muscle mass & resting calorie consumption data Requires a smart scale Syncs to Apple Health app Zordai Syncs to Apple Health app Smart Watches … Smart Scales Mpow Bluetooth Weighing Scales I purchased this in 2019, may not be available anymore Syncs with: Apple Health, Fitbit, Google Fit Measures & tracks the following weight, Body Mass Index (BMI), body fat, fat-free body weight, subcutaneous fat, visceral fat, body water, skeletal muscle, muscle mass, bone mass, protein, BMR & metabolic age Other Thriva Understand your internal health, stay ahead of chronic diseases, and extend your healthspan with home blood tests and actionable next steps.
item.content:encoded:
Apps (iOS)

  • Apple Health
  • Megafit-Health Fitness Tool
    • Measures & tracks the following
      • weight, Body Mass Index (BMI), body fat %, body fat weight, body water, bone mass, rate of subcutaneous fat, visceral fat levels, basal metabolism body age, muscle mass & resting calorie consumption data
    • Requires a smart scale
    • Syncs to Apple Health app
  • Zordai
    • Syncs to Apple Health app

Smart Watches

  • …

Smart Scales

  • Mpow Bluetooth Weighing Scales
    • I purchased this in 2019, may not be available anymore
    • Syncs with: Apple Health, Fitbit, Google Fit
    • Measures & tracks the following
      • weight, Body Mass Index (BMI), body fat, fat-free body weight, subcutaneous fat, visceral fat, body water, skeletal muscle, muscle mass, bone mass, protein, BMR & metabolic age

Other

  • Thriva
    • Understand your internal health, stay ahead of chronic diseases, and extend your healthspan with home blood tests and actionable next steps.
      • Cholesterol (lipid profile), creatinine, cRP, ferritin, folate, free testosterone, hbA1c (diabetes), liver blood test, omega 3 & 6, total testosterone, vitamin B12 (active), vitamin B12 (total), vitamin B9 & B12 (active), vitamin D
    • Note: These at-home blood tests are not a substitute for professional medical care.
